ygData.subject: Re: Maelstorm
ygData.msgSnippet: Crotale falls back as PAcifix does slamming into a wall. He falls unconcious as well.  JetV sees Artemis fall and jumps for her but the EMP blast knocks him

Crotale falls back as PAcifix does slamming into a wall. He falls 
unconcious as well.  JetV sees Artemis fall and jumps for her but the 
EMP blast knocks him out finally and he falls to the ground in a dead 
heap.  Repugnus, doesn't fall quite unconcious as he switches to a 
second power source.  "Whats happening?" he siad loudly.  Then the 
ship jerked propeliing him into a wall and sucking up the rest of his 
energy.  Slag fell then stood, not daring ot give in until his own 
leader did.

Outside of the Hidden one Needlenose goes unconscience.  As he falls 
into the drift of space he nails the window of the D.E.D ship.  The 
window cracks and small fragments come out.  ZigZag and Suntreaker 
transform not affected much by the emp blast. The two nebulans Attach 
a wire to Needle nose and jump through a crack in the window, which 
would be small to arobot, but perfect for a nebulan.  As they land 
inside they tie the wire to a hold and then ship jerked throwing them 
and knocking them out.  Havotron notices them.  The EMP blast weakens 
him considerably and he makes the mistake of trying to talk, which 
uses the last of his energy and puts him out. Quake falls to the 
ground as he tries to carry a weak bot.  Scrapper tries to make sense 
of something he cannot then finally falls.  The ship follows behind 
the hidden one into the portal. As they come out Havotron comes 
to.  "Spinister, where are you, get this ship in control."  He looks 
out the front window seeing Needlenose attached and begininng to heat 
up.  The fall in a crazy spin towards a island in the present day 
archpiligo of Japan.  Quake wakes up and grabs Scrapper of of him who 
had fallen there.  "Aww, jeez my back.."
--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Artemis/Sludge
> 
> 
> Sludge was thrown to a ship's wall and he was knocked out. Artemis 
> was trown to a wall and she started to regain counciness.
